name: How did you die today?
description:
Hy everyone,

thanks for coming by! This is my addition to the Nokia 3310 Game Jam 2.

Controls:

Numpad:  - 5 - Confirm Menu - Start Round

inGame Numpad 1-9.

The Earth is going down, means plenty new Jobs in Hell are needed. This is your change to get off your lousy demonass and get a proper paycheck.

Send the New comers too there personal eternal Hell.  The  way this poor souls left there lifes determines in which hell they supposed to go.

// 1. decapitate
// 2. burnt
// 3. drown
// 4. Starved
// 5. plaque
// 6. killed

Some say there is even a way to come into Heaven, but I think we leave it by the ruomors.

Big Thanks to:       TRIX

Have Fun
